thread.title: Fantastic small boutique hotel in a quiet street near the Garde de Nord Rail station.
thread.title_full: Fantastic small boutique hotel in a quiet street near the Garde de Nord Rail station. - Review of Hotel HELUSSI, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Ian R
title: Fantastic small boutique hotel in a quiet street near the Garde de Nord Rail station.
text:
9/02/2017, 6 day stay: We could highly recommend this lovely hotel in a nice quiet location yet within easy walking distance of the Metro system, restaurants, and brasseries. One of the highlights of this hotel was the attitude of the staff who were very friendly, helpful and courteous.
The rooms were of a good size clean and comfotable and we could recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a reasonably priced small hotel.
Cathy & Ian
